name: representationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows things as they are normally seen: Although his paintings are representational, it would be a mistake to only interpret them representationally. Her style was a representationally simplified one, but still very powerful.
More examplesFewer examplesThese artworks are of great historical importance, but representationally they can only be described as ugly.It may be a representationally inaccurate picture of the city, but it has strongly influenced our understanding of the civilization.Her rendering of the scene is unquestionably representationally superior to mine.
